info.title: ApiManagementClient
info.description: Use these REST APIs for performing operations on API entity and their Operations associated with your Azure API Management deployment.

get.description: Lists all APIs of the API Management service instance.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field       | Supported operators    | Supported functions               |
|-------------|------------------------|-----------------------------------|
| id          | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, startswith, endswith |
| name        | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, startswith, endswith |
| description | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, startswith, endswith |
| serviceUrl  | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, startswith, endswith |
| path        | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, startswith, endswith |

parameters.name: expandApiVersionSet
parameters.description: Include full ApiVersionSet resource in response

200.description: Paged Result response of Apis.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified API entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the API specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified API entity.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates new or updates existing specified API of the API Management service instance.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Create or update parameters.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Api Entity. For Create Api Etag should not be specified. For Update Etag should match the existing Entity or it can be * for unconditional update.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: API was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the specified API of the API Management service instance.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: API Update Contract parameters.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the API entity. ETag should match the current entity state in the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified API of the API Management service instance.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the API Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all revisions of an API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field       | Supported operators    | Supported functions               |
|-------------|------------------------|-----------------------------------|

|apiRevision | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith|

200.description: The operation returns a list of revision details.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all releases of an API. An API release is created when making an API Revision current. Releases are also used to rollback to previous revisions. Results will be paged and can be constrained by the $top and $skip parameters.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field | Supported operators    | Supported functions                         |
|-------|------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| name  | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
|notes|ge le eq ne gt lt|substringof contains startswith endswith|

200.description: The operation returns a list of API Releases.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: releaseId
parameters.description: Release identifier within an API. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

get.description: Returns the details of an API release.

200.description: The operation returns the details of an API Release.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new Release for the API.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Create parameters.

200.description: Release was successfully updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the release failed.

patch.description: Updates the details of the release of the API specified by its identifier.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: API Release Update parameters.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified release in the API.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists a collection of the operations for the specified API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field       | Supported operators    | Supported functions               |
|-------------|------------------------|-----------------------------------|
| name        | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, startswith, endswith |
| method      | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, startswith, endswith |
| description | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, startswith, endswith |
| urlTemplate | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, startswith, endswith |

200.description: A collection of operation summary entities at the API level.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API operation specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified API operation entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the API Operation specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified Operation entity.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new operation in the API or updates an existing one.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Create parameters.

200.description: Operation was successfully updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the details of the operation in the API specified by its identifier.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: API Operation Update parameters.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the API Operation Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified operation in the API.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the API Operation Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the list of policy configuration at the API Operation level.

200.description: Api Operations Policy Collection.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API operation policy specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified API operation policy entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the policy configuration at the API Operation level.

200.description: Api Operation Policy information.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates policy configuration for the API Operation level.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The policy contents to apply.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Api Operation policy to update. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

201.description: Api Operation policy configuration was successfully created.

200.description: Api Operation policy configuration of the tenant was successfully updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the policy configuration at the Api Operation.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Api Operation Policy to delete. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

204.description: Successfully deleted the policy configuration at the API Operation level.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Products, which the API is part of.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field | Supported operators    | Supported functions                         |
|-------|------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| name  | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |

200.description: The operation returns a collection of products which have the Api entity.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the policy configuration at the API level.

200.description: Apis Policy Collection.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API policy specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified API Policy entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the policy configuration at the API level.

200.description: Api Policy information.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates policy configuration for the API.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The policy contents to apply.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Api Policy to update. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

201.description: Api policy configuration was successfully created.

200.description: Api policy configuration of the tenant was successfully updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the policy configuration at the Api.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Api policy to update. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

204.description: Successfully deleted the policy configuration at the API level.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the schema configuration at the API level.

200.description: Apis Schema Collection.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the schema specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified schema entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the schema configuration at the API level.

200.description: Api Schema information.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates schema configuration for the API.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The schema contents to apply.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Api Schema to update. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

201.description: Api schema configuration was successfully created.

200.description: Api schema configuration of the tenant was successfully updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the schema configuration at the Api.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Api schema to update. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

204.description: Successfully deleted the schema configuration at the API level.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists a collection of apis associated with tags.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field       | Supported operators    | Supported functions                         |
|-------------|------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| id          | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| name        | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| aid         | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| apiRevision | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| path        | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| description | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| serviceUrl  | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| isCurrent   | eq                     | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |

200.description: Lists a collection of TagResource entities.

get.description: Lists all diagnostics of an API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field       | Supported operators    | Supported functions               |
|-------------|------------------------|-----------------------------------|
| id          | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, startswith, endswith |

200.description: Paged Result response of diagnostics for an API.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the Diagnostic for an API specified by its identifier.

200.description: Operation completed successfully.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the Diagnostic for an API specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified Diagnostic entity.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new Diagnostic for an API or updates an existing one.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Create parameters.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Diagnostic Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

200.description: Diagnostic was successfully updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the details of the Diagnostic for an API specified by its identifier.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Diagnostic Update parameters.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Diagnostic Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified Diagnostic from an API.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Diagnostic Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all loggers associated with the specified Diagnostic of an API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field       | Supported operators    | Supported functions               |
|-------------|------------------------|-----------------------------------|
| id          | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, startswith, endswith |
| type        | eq                     |                                   |

200.description: Paged Result response of loggers assigned to the specified Diagnostic.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Checks that logger entity specified by identifier is associated with the diagnostics entity.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Attaches a logger to a diagnostic for an API.

201.description: Logger was successfully attached to Diagnostic.

200.description: Logger to Diagnostic link was successfully updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified Logger from Diagnostic for an API.

204.description: The Logger was successfully detached from Diagnostic.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

| state        | eq                     |                                   |
| userId          | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, startswith, endswith |

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the Issue for an API specified by its identifier.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Issue Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Paged Result response of issue comments for the API.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the issue Comment for an API specified by its identifier.

parameters.name: If-Match

200.description: Issue Comment was successfully updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.description: ETag of the Issue Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

204.description: The issue Comment was successfully deleted.

parameters.name: $filter

|-------------|------------------------|-----------------------------------|
| id          | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, startswith, endswith |

200.description: Paged Result response of issue comments for the API.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the issue Attachment for an API specified by its identifier.

200.description: Operation completed successfully.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

get.description: Gets the details of the API specified by its identifier in the format specified to the Storage Blob with SAS Key valid for 5 minutes.

parameters.name: Accept

values.description: Export the Api Definition in OpenApi Specification 2.0 format to the Storage Blob.
values.name: OpenApi2

values.description: Export the Api Definition in WSDL Schema to Storage Blob.
values.name: Wsdl

values.description: Export the Api Definition in WADL Schema to Storage Blob.
values.name: Wadl

parameters.description: Format in which to export the Api Details to the Storage Blob with Sas Key valid for 5 minutes.

parameters.name: export
parameters.description: Query parameter required to export the API details.

200.description: The response contains a stream with a full set of API metadata and includes API entity with an embedded array of operation entities.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

link.description: Link to the Storage Blob containing the result of the export operation. The Blob Uri is only valid for 5 minutes.

properties.description: Api entity create of update properties.

contentValue.description: Content value when Importing an API.

contentFormat.description: Format of the Content in which the API is getting imported.

values.description: The contents are inline and Content type is a WADL document.
The WADL document is hosted on a publicly accessible internet address.
The contents are inline and Content Type is a OpenApi 2.0 Document.
The Open Api 2.0 document is hosted on a publicly accessible internet address.
The contents are inline and the document is a WSDL/Soap document.
The WSDL document is hosted on a publicly accessible internet address.

wsdlSelector.description: Criteria to limit import of WSDL to a subset of the document.

wsdlServiceName.description: Name of service to import from WSDL

wsdlEndpointName.description: Name of endpoint(port) to import from WSDL

serviceUrl.description: Absolute URL of the backend service implementing this API.

path.description: Relative URL uniquely identifying this API and all of its resource paths within the API Management service instance. It is appended to the API endpoint base URL specified during the service instance creation to form a public URL for this API.

protocols.description: Describes on which protocols the operations in this API can be invoked.

properties.description: Properties of the API entity that can be updated.

serviceUrl.description: Absolute URL of the backend service implementing this API.

path.description: Relative URL uniquely identifying this API and all of its resource paths within the API Management service instance. It is appended to the API endpoint base URL specified during the service instance creation to form a public URL for this API.

protocols.description: Describes on which protocols the operations in this API can be invoked.

description.description: Description of the API. May include HTML formatting tags.

authenticationSettings.description: Collection of authentication settings included into this API.

subscriptionKeyParameterNames.description: Protocols over which API is made available.

apiRevision.description: Describes the Revision of the Api. If no value is provided, default revision 1 is created

apiVersion.description: Indicates the Version identifier of the API if the API is versioned

isCurrent.description: Indicates if API revision is current api revision.

isOnline.description: Indicates if API revision is accessible via the gateway.

apiVersionSetId.description: A resource identifier for the related ApiVersionSet.

properties.description: Properties of the Api Revision Contract.

createdDateTime.description: The time the API Revision was created. The date conforms to the following format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

updatedDateTime.description: The time the API Revision were updated. The date conforms to the following format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

privateUrl.description: Gateway URL for accessing the non-current API Revision.

isOnline.description: Indicates if API revision is the current api revision.

isCurrent.description: Indicates if API revision is accessible via the gateway.

ApiRevisionInfoContract.description: Object used to create an API Revision or Version based on an existing API Revision

sourceApiId.description: Resource identifier of API to be used to create the revision from.

apiVersionName.description: Version identifier for the new API Version.

properties.description: Properties of the Api Release Contract.

apiId.description: Identifier of the API the release belongs to.

createdDateTime.description: The time the API was released. The date conforms to the following format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

updatedDateTime.description: The time the API release was updated.

method.description: A Valid HTTP Operation Method. Typical Http Methods like GET, PUT, POST but not limited by only them.

urlTemplate.description: Relative URL template identifying the target resource for this operation. May include parameters. Example: /customers/{cid}/orders/{oid}/?date={date}

method.description: A Valid HTTP Operation Method. Typical Http Methods like GET, PUT, POST but not limited by only them.

urlTemplate.description: Relative URL template identifying the target resource for this operation. May include parameters. Example: /customers/{cid}/orders/{oid}/?date={date}

description.description: Description of the operation. May include HTML formatting tags.

OperationEntityBaseContract.description: Api Operation Entity Base Contract details.

properties.description: Properties of the API Operation entity that can be updated.

required.description: whether parameter is required or not.

contentType.description: Specifies a registered or custom content type for this representation, e.g. application/xml.

schemaId.description: Schema identifier. Applicable only if 'contentType' value is neither 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' nor 'multipart/form-data'.

typeName.description: Type name defined by the schema. Applicable only if 'contentType' value is neither 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' nor 'multipart/form-data'.

formParameters.description: Collection of form parameters. Required if 'contentType' value is either 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' or 'multipart/form-data'..

queryParameters.description: Collection of operation request query parameters.

query.description: Subscription key query string parameter name.

SchemaCollection.description: The response of the list schema operation.

contentType.description: Must be a valid a media type used in a Content-Type header as defined in the RFC 2616. Media type of the schema document (e.g. application/json, application/xml).

value.description: Json escaped string defining the document representing the Schema.

createdDate.description: Date and time when the issue was created.

userId.description: A resource identifier for the user created the issue.

apiId.description: A resource identifier for the API the issue was created for.

createdDate.description: Date and time when the comment was created.

userId.description: A resource identifier for the user who left the comment.

title.description: Filename by which the binary data will be saved.

contentFormat.description: Either 'link' if content is provided via an HTTP link or the MIME type of the Base64-encoded binary data provided in the 'content' property.

content.description: An HTTP link or Base64-encoded binary data.

ApiIdParameter.name: apiId
ApiIdParameter.description: API identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

ApiIdRevParameter.name: apiId
ApiIdRevParameter.description: API revision identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance. Non-current revision has ;rev=n as a suffix where n is the revision number.

OperationIdParameter.name: operationId
OperationIdParameter.description: Operation identifier within an API. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

IfMatch.name: If-Match
IfMatch.description: ETag of the Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

SchemaIdParameter.name: schemaId
SchemaIdParameter.description: Schema identifier within an API. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

IssueIdParameter.name: issueId
IssueIdParameter.description: Issue identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

CommentIdParameter.name: commentId
CommentIdParameter.description: Comment identifier within an Issue. Must be unique in the current Issue.

AttachmentIdParameter.name: attachmentId
AttachmentIdParameter.description: Attachment identifier within an Issue. Must be unique in the current Issue.
